==German== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|[ˈdiːzən]|[ˈdiːzn̩]}} * {{audio|de|De-diesen.ogg|Audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|die|sen}} ===Pronoun=== {{head|de|pronoun form}} # {{inflection of|de|dieser||acc|m|s}}; "[[this]]" #: ''Ich will '''diesen''' Apfel'' - I want '''this''' apple. # {{inflection of|de|dieser||dat|p}}; "[[these]]" #: ''Ich half '''diesen''' Tieren'' - I helped '''these''' animals. ---- ==Spanish== ===Verb=== {{head|es|verb form}} # {{es-verb form of|mood=subj|tense=imp|sera=se|num=p|pers=2|formal=y|ending=ar|dar}} # {{es-verb form of|mood=subj|tense=imp|sera=se|num=p|pers=3|ending=ar|dar}}
